messages.subject: Awesome fun awaits, at the 4th Annual UWG!!!!
messages.msgSnippet: Just 1 month until the fun begins!   Hurry now and register,  to join us for a week of family fun, camaraderie and support among unschooling  families from
messages.messageBody:
Just
1 month until the fun begins!  
Hurry now and register,  to join us for
a week of family fun, camaraderie and support among unschooling 
families from around the world at the:
 
4TH ANNUAL UNSCHOOLERS WATERPARK GATHERING
        WHERE: Kalahari Waterpark Resort - Sandusky, Ohio
        WHEN:   May 15 - 20, 2011

This years UWG will have even more activities for the entire family to enjoy! 
Pool
Party Meet & Greet, Winter Carnival, Family Speed Dating, Mom's
Night Out, Dad's Gatherings (SSUDS), Talent Show, Music Jams, Kids
Market place, chartered Lake Erie Ferry Rides, NASA tours, and lots more!

Awesome Talks and Discussion
Plus,
they'll be lots of great Talks and Discussions for families to learn,
discuss and share information and experiences on various topics of unschooling - ie passion driven  / natural learning.

Rooms are going quickly, just a few kitchen suites left!
Just 1 month left until our 2011 UWG Gathering.  So hurry and register
while
rooms are still available.  Our super discounted room rates also
includes your  waterpark passes. 
Rooms start at only $84/night.  What a
tremendous deal!!!

For further details on all our awesome Speakers, Funshops & Events and to register, please join our UWG yahoo group now at:


 http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UWG/


[ Please help us spread the word by forwarding this to all your unschoolly friends and groups. - THANKS!!!! ]

~ Carol Reinhard - UWG Founder & Coordinator
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UWG/
http://ugoevent.com/index.php











[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
